item.description:
This venue was suggested by one of our members who said this was a very good Thai restaurant, and the few reviews I found all agreed. I think Thai food (especially peanut sauces and mango sticky rice) is great!

You can check out the menu at http://www.siamcuisin...

PLEASE ONLY RSVP "YES" IF YOU TRULY PLAN TO SHOW UP! I will accept "YES" RSVP's until November 5th. The reservation will be under BETSY - EDMG.

So join me at Siam Cuisine and we will "Thai" one on (if you hate puns, then please forgive me).

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: SIAM CUISINE 11/06/07
